entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
